info.author: Mark Blakeney
info.description:
## DUMMYSETUPTESTAPP

[dummysetuptestapp](http://github.com/bulletmark/dummysetuptestapp) is a
trival python command line utility created merely to demonstrate [this
bug](https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/issues/510).

## INSTALLATION

Requires python 3.4 or later. Note [dummysetuptestapp is on
PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/dummysetuptestapp/) so you can `sudo pip3 install
dummysetuptestapp` or:

```
$ git clone http://github.com/bulletmark/dummysetuptestapp
$ cd dummysetuptestapp
$ sudo pip3 install .
```

## TESTS

Run using setuptools created `console_script` from `entry_points`:

    time dummysetuptestapp

This takes about 2.08 seconds to run on a Raspberry Pi 2 model B.

Run using explicit manually created stub:

    time dummysetuptestapp-main

This takes about 0.29 seconds to run on a Raspberry Pi 2 model B.

DUMMYSETUPTESTAPP

dummysetuptestapp is a trival python command line utility created merely to demonstrate this bug.

Requires python 3.4 or later. Note dummysetuptestapp is on PyPI so you can sudo pip3 install dummysetuptestapp or:

This takes about 2.08 seconds to run on a Raspberry Pi 2 model B.
